            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>River Watch Manitoba data is collected by the South Central Eco Institute (SCEI). SCEI is a group of like-minded organizations interested in monitoring and reporting water quality in Manitoba. Data collected is stored on the SCEI website and publicly available. River Watch Manitoba is a student driven data collection project offered throughout Manitoba. In partnership with several watershed districts, standardized equipment sets are available for class/student use. With over 10 years of data collection, formal protocols are very well established and are in line with River Watch Red River Basin in the USA offered by the International Water Institute.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-g9ft-3q56
notes: River Watch Manitoba data is collected by the South Central Eco Institute (SCEI). SCEI is a group of like-minded organizations interested in monitoring and reporting water quality in Manitoba. Data collected is stored on the SCEI website and publicly available. River Watch Manitoba is a student driven data collection project offered throughout Manitoba. In partnership with several watershed districts, standardized equipment sets are available for class/student use. With over 10 years of data collection, formal protocols are very well established and are in line with River Watch Red River Basin in the USA offered by the International Water Institute.

notes_translated.en: River Watch Manitoba data is collected by the South Central Eco Institute (SCEI). SCEI is a group of like-minded organizations interested in monitoring and reporting water quality in Manitoba. Data collected is stored on the SCEI website and publicly available. River Watch Manitoba is a student driven data collection project offered throughout Manitoba. In partnership with several watershed districts, standardized equipment sets are available for class/student use. With over 10 years of data collection, formal protocols are very well established and are in line with River Watch Red River Basin in the USA offered by the International Water Institute.
notes_translated.fr: Les données de River Watch Manitoba sont recueillies par le South Central Eco Institute (SCEI). La SCEI est un groupe d'organisations partageant les mêmes idées qui s'intéressent à la surveillance et à la production de rapports sur la qualité de l'eau au Manitoba. Les données collectées sont stockées sur le site Web de la SCEI et mises à la disposition du public. River Watch Manitoba est un projet de collecte de données piloté par des étudiants et proposé dans tout le Manitoba. En partenariat avec plusieurs districts hydrographiques, des ensembles d'équipements standardisés sont disponibles pour les classes et les étudiants. Avec plus de 10 ans de collecte de données, les protocoles formels sont très bien établis et sont conformes à ceux proposés par River Watch Red River Basin aux États-Unis par l'Institut international de l'eau.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: River Watch Manitoba Water Quality Monitoring

title_translated.en: River Watch Manitoba Water Quality Monitoring
title_translated.fr: Surveillance de la qualité de l'eau de River Watch au Manitoba
